title: A user can select their picks by tapping or clicking on a bracket entry in a round
custom_preconds: Given I am on the bracket page
custom_steps: When I click on a bracket entry
custom_expected: Then I should see the clicked entry being selected

title: A user should see a "Submit My Picks" button once all the selections are made (a bracket should be in "open" state)
custom_preconds: Given I am on the bracket site
custom_steps: When I complete my picks for the full bracket
custom_expected:
Then I should see a button labeled "Submit My Picks"
And the button color should be GREEN

title: On a mobile device, a user can view only 1 round at a time
custom_preconds: Given I am on viewing a bracket on a mobile device
custom_expected: Then I should only see 1 round of bracket in view at any give time

title: On a mobile device, a user can only scroll vertically
custom_preconds: Given I am on viewing a bracket on a mobile device
custom_expected: Then I can only scroll vertically (up/down) when there is content to view at the bottom/top

title: On a mobile device, a user can swipe right to move to the next round of bracket
custom_preconds:
Given I am on viewing a bracket on a mobile device

And I am viewing the 1st round of bracket
custom_steps: When I swipe right (move to the next round)
custom_expected: Then I should see the next round of bracket

title: On a mobile device, a user can swipe left to move to previous round of bracket
custom_preconds:
Given I am on viewing a bracket on a mobile device

And I am on the 2nd round of bracket
custom_steps: When I swipe left from the 2nd round of bracket
custom_expected: Then I should see the 1st round of bracket

title: A user will be able to register for an account via the register link in the bracket login page
custom_preconds: Given I am trying to view an "OPEN" bracket
custom_steps:
When I try to login
And I don't have an account
And I hit the "Register" link
custom_expected: Then I should be able to register for an account

title: A user's selection changes in an earlier round will have impact on the final result
custom_preconds:
Given I am on the bracket site
And I have selected my team (Team X) for my team bracket in round 1
And I have selected my team for my team (Team X) bracket for all other later rounds  
And my team (Team X) is the winner of the team bracket
custom_steps: When I change my selection at any previous round from Team X to Team Y
custom_expected: Then my final winning selection will be removed as well

title: A user will see a confirmation overlay once the bracket selection is submitted
custom_preconds:
Given I am on the bracket selection page 
And I am logged in 
And I made my selections
custom_steps: When I submit my bracket selection
custom_expected:
Then I should see a confirmation overlay for my submission
And I should an "Ok" button to exit out

title: A user must be at least 18 years of age in order to be prize eligible
custom_preconds: # This test case may be difficult to execute at this stage

title: An unregistered user will not be able to submit a bracket
custom_preconds:
Given I have a link for OPEN bracket
And I am viewing it
custom_steps:
When I make my bracket picks 
And I submit my picks
custom_expected:
Then I should be brought to the login screen
And my picks will not be submitted without logging in

title: An unregistered user will be able to sign up for an MLB account before submitting  a bracket picks
custom_preconds:
Given I have a link for OPEN bracket
And I am viewing it
custom_steps:
When I make my bracket picks
And I submit my picks
custom_expected:
Then I should be brought to the login screen
When I enter my valid information in the registration form
Then I should be able to sign up for an account

title: An unregistered user's picked data will NOT be saved for later
custom_preconds:
Given I have a link for OPEN bracket
And I am viewing it
custom_steps:
When I make my bracket picks
And I close the browser window
And I navigate to the bracket URL again in a new window
custom_expected: Then my previous selection will not be populated

title: A user cannot submit his/her picks unless s/he picks from each matchup in each round
custom_preconds: Given I am playing an OPEN bracket
custom_steps:
When I make a selection from each matchup in round 1
And I make a selection from each matchup in round 2
And I make only 1 selection from 1 matchup in round 3
And I make the only option available in the FINAL round
custom_expected: Then I should not see "Submit My Picks" button

title: A user's picks will be locally stored
All required tiebreaker questions must be answered before submitting answeres
A bracket cannot be submitted in "scoring" state
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in to the MLB site
And I am on the brackets site
custom_steps:
When I am making my selection for a bracket in "open" state
And the bracket state changes in the backend in Contentful from "open" to "scoring"
And I submit my bracket picks
custom_expected: Then I should not be able to submit my selection

title: A bracket in SCORING state has some properties
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a bracket in SCORING state
custom_expected:
Then I should not be able to make changes to the previously selected values
And I should not see the SUBMIT button
And the populated data is retrieved from Contentful

title: A bracket in SCORING state will display the selections in gray background
Validate the properties of a bracket in SCORING state
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a bracket in SCORING state
custom_expected:
Then I should see the following:

    - has a grey border color

    - highlights the winning seed (from Contentful) with a light grey background

    - adds the top seed score and bottom seed score (from Contentful)

    - adds the “final” label between the scores/seeds

title: A bracket selections cannot be changed in "scoring" state
A user will not be allowed to makes changes to an unfinished bracket which was in OPEN state but changes to SCORING
custom_preconds:
Given I am making my picks for a bracket in OPEN state
And I do not finish my selections
custom_steps:
When the bracket changes its selection from OPEN to SCORING 
And I return to my bracket
custom_expected: Then I will not be able to make any more changes to my picks

title: Verify the properties of a scored matchup in "scoring" state
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a "scored" bracket
custom_steps: When the bracket state = scoring, and a matchup has a winner
custom_expected:
Then the matchup should be scored
And a "scored" matchup will have a grey border
And a "scored" matchup will highlight the winning seed (from Contentful) with a light grey background
And a "scored" matchup will add the top seed score and bottom seed score (from Contentful)
And a "scored" matchup will add the “final” label between the scores/seeds

title: A bracket cannot be submitted in locked state
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in to the MLB site
And I am on the brackets site
custom_steps:
When I am making my selection for a bracket in "open" state
And the bracket state changes in the backend in Contentful from "open" to "locked"
And I submit my bracket picks
custom_expected:
Then I should not be able to submit my selection
And I should not see a submit button

title: When a bracket is in LOCKED state, there will be a notification message stating so
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a backed in LOCKED state
custom_expected: Then I should see "The bracket contest is now locked. You can no longer edit your picks. Check back soon for the contest to begin!"

title: The matchup seeds won't be selectable in a LOCKED bracket
A non-existing bracket will display a human readable error message
custom_preconds: Given I am attempting to view a bracket which does not exist [/brackets/non-existing-bracket]
custom_expected: Then I should see an error message with ""![](index.php?/attachments/get/3825137)

title: Verify the messages on the overlay
custom_preconds: Given I have submitted my bracket selections
custom_expected:
Then I should see the confirmation overlay
And I should see a header with "Your Bracket Picks Are In!"
And I should see a check mark in blue
And I should see an "Ok" button to close the overlay
And I should see a "RALLY" logo at the bottom

title: Each matchup card in each round will contain the information for a player or a team
custom_preconds: Given I am on the team bracket page
custom_expected: Then I should see the team info on the team card

title: Each round of player bracket will contain player info in each matchup card
custom_preconds: Given I am on the player bracket page
custom_expected: Then I should see player card containing player details

title: Each player card on player bracket will contain player headshot and player position
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a player bracket
custom_expected:
Then I should see a player headshot
And I should see a player position
# this information will be served via stats api

title: Each team card on player bracket will contain team logo and team record
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a team bracket
custom_expected:
Then I should see team logo for each team in each team card
And I should see team record for each team in each team card

# this information will be fetched from statsapi

title: A registered user should be able to login to bracket
custom_preconds: Given I am on the bracket login site
custom_steps: When I enter my username and password
custom_expected:
Then I should be able to login

*[And I should get an okta token id in the backend]

title: A team or player advancing to the next round due to a "Bye" selection cannot be changed in the next round or the previous round
custom_preconds: Given I am playing a team bracket
custom_steps:
When I am selecting my round 1 selections
And I see a team missing "Bye" in one of the round 1 selections [there is only one team to choose from, the other team is missing in the selection]
custom_expected:
Then the other team will advance to the next round automatically
And I will not be able to deselect the only team in round 1

title: There will be a green mark displaying if the user picked the right choice in each round
custom_preconds: Given I am playing a team bracket
custom_steps:
When I select Team X in my first round selection
And my selection is correct
custom_expected: Then I should see a green background and the i icon changes to a checkmark in the left info bar

title: There will be a red mark displaying if the user picked the wrong choice in each round
custom_preconds: Given I am playing a team bracket
custom_steps:
When I select Team X in my first round selection
And my selection is incorrect
custom_expected: Then I should see a red background and the i icon changes to a "x" in the left info bar

title: A bracket will contain the correct region images
custom_expected: Then I should see the custom region images received from Contentful![](index.php?/attachments/get/3825052)

title: There will be a submit button to submit a user's picks
custom_steps: When I pick my selection from each round [can leave some empty as well]
custom_expected: Then I should see a submit button to submit my picks

title: A user will be welcomed with a welcome overlay message
custom_preconds: Given I open the URL for a bracket which is in "open" state
custom_expected: Then I should be welcomed with an overlay message describing the bracket to me!![](index.php?/attachments/get/3825055)

title: The navigation bar in a bracket will contain a few key features
custom_preconds: Given I am viewing a "locked" bracket
custom_steps: When I am viewing the navigation bar
custom_expected:
Then I should see the following:
    The bar contains labels for each round (for as many rounds as they are + 1 for Winner). 

    The round that is selected / in focus is highlighted with white text and a blue bar underneath it. 

    Users can click a round in the navigation bar to select it (and bracket focuses on it)

    As a mobile user swipes between rounds, the focus style needs to update in the navigation bar

    The last round is labeled “Final”

    There is a “Winner” round after Final

    When a round is scored fully (will be less than the value of the Active Round from Contentful), display a “Final” icon underneath the round label in the navigation bar

title: When a user selects their winning team in the “Final” matchup, display a larger version of their icon (whatever icon we display on the left of their bracket element).
custom_steps: When I select the winning team in the “Final” matchup
custom_expected: Then I should see the  winning team in the “Final” matchup, display a larger version of their icon ![](index.php?/attachments/get/3825056)

title: On a mobile device, the navigation bar should be sticky
custom_steps: When I scroll down to the page
custom_expected: Then I should see the navigation bar sticking to the top instead of scrolling with the page

title: The MLB logo on mobile app bracket page will be a static image. The logo should not be clickable and cannot navigate users to a different page
custom_preconds:
Given I am using the MLB app
And I navigate to an open bracket from the app
custom_steps: When I click on the MLB logo
custom_expected:
Then I should stay of the bracket page
And I should not be redirected to the mlb home page

title: For an entry card, if a team is missing its logo, we will display the MLB logo in its place
custom_preconds: Given I am playing an OPEN bracket
custom_steps: And I am viewing an entry where an entry card is missing a team's logo
custom_expected: Then I should see the MLB logo instead of the team logo

title: A user should be able to reset the password using the email address associated with the account
Account look up will not return any valid data if the user tries to reset the password using an email address which does not exists
The system should be able to detect if a user is logged in
custom_preconds: Given I am on the bracket site
custom_expected: Then the system will be able realize that I am a logged in user [using the okta id]

title: The system should be able to detect if a user is not logged in
custom_preconds: Given I am on the bracket site
custom_steps: And I am not logged in
custom_expected: Then the system should be able to detect that I am not logged in [*there won't be any okta id]

title: A user's selection will be saved locally
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in to MLB site
And I am playing a bracket
custom_steps:
When I make some selections
And I decide to not continue my selection now
And I return to my selections at a later time
custom_expected: Then I should see my previous picks

title: Matchup borders, selection highlight, button border, button “active” color, etc can be of different colors based on the color code received from Contentful
custom_preconds: Given I am logged in to a bracket in "open" state
custom_steps: When I am viewing the bracket
custom_expected: Then I should see matchup borders, selection highlight, button border, button “active” color, etc in "light blue" [* or in the color that is saved in Contentful "sponsor color" value]

title: A user must be at least 13 years of age in order to play the bracket
custom_preconds:
Given I am an OPEN bracket
And I have picked my bracket selection
And I submit my picks
custom_steps:
When I am presented with the tie breaker screen
And I enter my answers
And I enter my date of birth as "Sep 9, 2000"
And I submit my answers
custom_expected: Then I should not be able to submit my answers

title: A user cannot submit a bracket without entering their date of birth
custom_preconds:
Given I am an OPEN bracket
And I have picked my bracket selection
And I submit my picks
custom_steps:
When I am presented with the tie breaker screen
And I do not enter my date of birth
And I try to submit my tie breaker selections
custom_expected: Then I will not be able to submit my selections

title: A user under 13 will see an error message
custom_preconds:
Given I am an OPEN bracket
And I have picked my bracket selection
And I submit my picks
custom_steps:
When I am presented with the tie breaker screen
And I enter my picks 
And I enter my date of birth as "Sep 9, 2009" (or a date that will make the user under 13 years old)
And I submit my answers
custom_expected: Then I should see an error message

title: A user over 13, the entered date of birth value will be included in the JSON (bracket) data
custom_preconds:
Given I am an OPEN bracket
And I have picked my bracket selection
And I submit my picks
custom_steps:
When I am presented with the tie breaker screen
And I enter my picks
And I enter my date of birth as "Sep 9, 2000" (or a date that will make the user over 13 years of age)
And I submit my answers
custom_expected:
Then I should not see an error message
And my picks will be submitted
And I should be able to see my picks in the following API call in the "Network" tab on the browser console "https://rally.gamingeng-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.com/bracket/<a bracket id>"

title: A user under 13 will  be able to change his/her date of birth by refreshing the page
custom_preconds:
Given I am an OPEN bracket
And I have picked my bracket selection
And I submit my picks
custom_steps:
When I am presented with the tie breaker screen
And I enter my picks
And I enter my date of birth as "Sep 9, 2009" (or a date that will make the user under 13 years old)
And I submit my answers
Then I should see an error message 
When I refresh the browser page
And I change my date of birth to "Sep 9, 2000"

When I change my date of birth to "Sep 9, 2000"
custom_expected:
Then I should be able to submit my picks
And my data will be submitted with the new DOB entered
